title: Why is Stromae so good?
body:
He's a Belgian man that sings French hits that get a ton of views on Youtube, and appears to be almost unknown of in (most) North America.

Why?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VHoT4N43jK8
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oiKj0Z_Xnjc
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ublchJYzhao

A lot of the songs talk about a lot of darker themes too, and some of his music videos are really strong. Can we talk about him and his music?
